title: Joshua Tree National Park: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved                   #FindYourPark for the NPS Centennial               Artists in Residence: Interpreting Beauty               We Love Our Volunteers               Work With Us         Â    NPS Centennial 2016 is the 100th birthday of the National Park Service. We're challenging you to Find Your Park in one of the more than 400 national park units around the country. Learn more and find out how to share your own experiences. Artist in Residence Participants in Joshua Tree's distinguished Artist in Residence program find inspiration to forge a better understanding and dialogue about our national parks, desert landscapes, and the relationship between wildlands and the human spirit.  Volunteer In fiscal year 2014, volunteers contributed a record-setting 47,667 hours to Joshua Tree National Park. Find out more about how you can help. Work With Us Joshua Tree's staff comprises about 100 full-time equivalent employees. Find out more about year-round and seasonal job opportunities in the national park. Donate Find out how to make a monetary contribution to Joshua Tree National Park.
